title: PepsiCo Announces Agriculture Accelerator Projects to Support Farmer Livelihoods, Scale Sustainable Innovation and ... - PR Newswire
summary: PepsiCo announced the third year of its global agriculture program, the Positive Agriculture Outcomes (PAO) Accelerator, backing eight new innovation projects across nine countries, with a focus on sustainability and regenerative agriculture practices.
green_innovation: TRUE, The article describes PepsiCo's Positive Agriculture Outcomes (PAO) Accelerator program, which focuses on addressing urgent challenges in agriculture, promoting regenerative farming practices, and supporting innovative projects to improve sustainability and climate resilience.

green_process: TRUE, PepsiCo's Positive Agriculture Outcomes (PAO) Accelerator program focuses on investing in projects that minimize environmental impacts, promote sustainability in agriculture, and support regenerative practices, qualifying as a green process.
greenwashing: FALSE, The article discusses PepsiCo's genuine efforts in promoting sustainability and regenerative agriculture practices through its Positive Agriculture Outcomes (PAO) Accelerator program, without misrepresenting environmental benefits or engaging in greenwashing.
